name: Car Menace
description:
This game was developed by the Fresher students of VIT University, Bhopal, India as an assignment under the course of B.Tech in CSE with Specialization in Gaming Technology.

The Developers are –

1.Nishant Verma(20BCG10094)
2.Nikhil Garg(20BCG10022)
3.Chakshu Bhardwaj(20BCG10100) 

P.S – We also took help from a few fellow classmates and some other friends specially Shail teotia(who happens to be a very good friend) , to learn and develop some parts of the game. This is a just a minimalistic, short and fun to play game .

We hope you would enjoy .
